DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine possibility use jaw-tapping training self-exercise develop memory prevent dementia elderly subject memory disturbance use functional magnetic resonance imaging ( fMRI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Functional Magnetic Resonance Imaging Study Jaw-tapping Movement Memory Function
DOC.detailed_description: Right-handed female volunteer age 50 year subjective memory complaint include study . Volunteers dentures , psychoactive medication , history stroke , neurologic disorder exclude . The protocol approve Institutional Review Board university-based hospital . After administer Seoul Neuropsychological Screening Battery ( SNSB ) , Mini-Mental State Examination ( MMSE ) score 24 Clinical Dementia Rating Scale ( CDR ) score 0 consider subjective memory complaint ( SMC ) , MMSE score 23 CDR score 0.5 consider MCI . All subject undergo two MRI scan . After first MRI , subject train tap jaw vertically 1.6 Hz home twice day 30 second every day four week .
DOC.criteria: Righthanded female volunteer age 50 year subjective memory complaint Volunteers denture , psychoactive medication , history stroke , neurologic disorder
